titleStmt.title: Difficiles nugæ, or, Observations touching the Torricellian experiment, and the various solutions of the same, especially touching the weight and elasticity of the air
titleStmt.author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, for William Shrowsbury ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Matthew Hale. Cf. BM.
Copy at reel 1309:10 lacks folded illus. and advertisement on p. [6]-[7] at end.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Library and Cambridge University Library.
